channel.title: Sanctuary Dev Team
channel.description:
hi im recently new here and im looking for people to help me build a server and when we are done i hope to make it a live server for players. *Source* [pi] Exion,Mtp Merged *pictures* [IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee88/dimarcol/Runescape/yell.png[/img] [IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee88/dimarcol/Runescape/members.png[/img] [IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee88/dimarcol/Runescape/KBD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee88/dimarcol/Runescape/home.png[/img] [u]projects to be done:[/u] setting up economy [s]fixing pest control[/s] Done [s]add donation stats[/s] Done Slayer task give pk points Jed with waves and Fire cape Reward Smithing Claws [s]D Claws[/s] done needs tweeks magic logs need graphic some costume items models ex:owner cape.etc and some minor things like doors fixed and ladders [u]Fetchers done:[/u] Barrows Pest control - shop needs tweeks Telaport tab- needs few tweeks skills attack str defense mage reg and ainchen pray range crafting needs testing smithing mostly works mining fixed most ore bugs wood choping fixed most bugs firemaking - is disabled cooking needs work fishing needs work [u]Staff:[/u] Server Coder: ME,prison190,Ineverbow (3/4) Client Coder:,(0/4) web client builder:,(0/1) gfx web designe: (0/1) server hoster:temp me,(0/1) Mods/admins: once server is online mod(0/2) admin(0/2) players: beta tester:my sister Format for applying for a position.
Applying for : GFX designer Real life name : Past Experience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
Applying for : Server Coder Real life name : Past Experience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
Applying for : Client Coder Real life name : Past Experience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
Applying for : Forums Developer Real life name : Past Experience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
Applying for : Hoster Real life name : Past Experience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
Applying for : Staff Real life name : Past Experience : Why do you want to work with us : How long will you be online for :
post here if interested :)

item.title: Sanctuary Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @srixs srixs
item.description:
@srixs wrote:

Applying for : Staff / (Graphic Designer?)
Real life name : Jordan
Past Experience : I have ran 6 servers in the past for long periods of time. I use photoshop daily.
Why do you want to work with us : It seems like this would be a fun server to be apart of
How long will you be online for : As long as I am needed. I am willing to help out when I can, which is 60% of the time (When I am doing school)
jordy805@live.com

Read full topic

item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

Applying for : Server Coder
Real life name : Dylan
Past Experience : Have made roughly 3 servers, only hosted one for about a year.
Why do you want to work with us : I feel that coding with other people would make it more worth while and fun.
How long will you be online for : After school so about 4-10 on weekdays and about 12-well 12 again on the weekends

item.title: Sanctuary Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @drip_dropz drip dropz
item.description:
@drip_dropz wrote:

Applying for : Staff
Real life name : mason guccione
Past Experience : have been a mod for 4 years. You may know some of these like Corruptionx but i thought the server wasa over. i have been on bainscape but i didnt want to play on there anymore. a very old one funnybutnotcool but that went offline and realmscape but the owner sold the server but know its called realmscape and ddsscape and etc… i have been a admin for 2 years. like ddsscape (yes i was a mod but i got admin later) and etc…
Why do you want to work with us : I do believe that the community will grow under a well mannered administration. I would think this would have a decent economy and very fun staff to hang out with and have fun. I would love to come to the meetings and figure out things to help the server. It would also be fun helping people out and getting to konw them, and will not be questioned as for being strict, none-idiotic etc.
How long will you be online for : almost all day unless hang out with friends

Read full topic

item.title: Sanctuary Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @lord_light lord light
item.description:
@lord_light wrote:

I want to be staff
My name is Ericson
i’m a moderator on zabscape 562
I’m an admin on demonic rain 317
I wanna join because I think I can get the server players well I know I can lol and I can help you out.
It depends on how much I like you and the server if I like it all weekend If I don’t I’ll get atleast 2 hours a day on weekends (demonic rain is my current comitment :P.

item.title: Sanctuary Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @prison190 prison190
item.description:
@prison190 wrote:

Applying for : Server Coder
Real life name : Chris

Past Expierience : I have worked with my own server, it is not up beause i cannot host, i have coded 317, 508, 562 servers. I would prefer you didn’t use the delta or pi because i have never really coded a delta and never seen a pi source. if this app is rejected let me know because i also would like to be the forum developer.

Why do you want to work with us : Because, i want to actually code a server that WILL BE UP. So i don’t sit and waste my time on my own projects.

How long will you be online for : I don’t know what you are specifically asking.

Read full topic
